h2_title: Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: You can then detransform and follow up with your own strong attacks and it will continue to burn for a while until it douses itself off with the water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water-Wood_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Water-Wood Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
You can then detransform and follow up with your own strong attacks and it will continue to burn for a while until it douses itself off with the water.
